parameters: if (rnd < 20) { treasure += 30; } else if (rnd < 50) { treasure += 20;} else { treasure += 10;}
Manifestation of lighting,\. a young girl appears in front of Neneko.\.\. A primal beast,\. daughter of thunder,\. ready to shred her furry body to pieces.
\n<\N[1]>Yoouuuu!\.\. My fur is all tingly,\. I'll make you pay for it!!
